item.title: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
item.description: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth.”

item.title: ‘Is it a case of them or us?’ We’re in our 40s. Do we retire early in our 50s — or save for our kids’ education?
item.description: “We’re both teachers, with a combined gross income of $210,000.”

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: Silver is turning into one of the hottest trades of 2025. Why this veteran investor is targeting $300 in a coming ‘mania’ phase.
item.description: Peter Krauth, author of “The Great Silver Bull,” says silver’s “mania phase” is not far off.

item.title: Chip sector’s gains are fading, but charts say bulls may just be resting up for a big rally
item.description: Charts suggest chip sector is enduring a “time correction,” and it seems likely to eventually be resolved with another rally.
